description: Percolation series for directed square lattice.
references: R. J. Baxter and A. J. Guttmann, Series expansion of the percolation probability for the directed square lattice, J. Phys. A 21 (1988), 3193-3204.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
